summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 29201, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 28th Avenue Northeast from East 60th Street southerly a distance of 374 feet, more or less; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved April 8, 1912.
